summary: Adds a new version if the execution hood in breezehome. just a new texture. NON- REPLACER
descriptionHtml:
Adds a execution hood with a funny face on it ( the face was made and drawn by me).
The hood is found in breezehome, in the bedroom. this does not replace the olkd textures og the execution hood.
if you cant find it in breezehome, look on your keyboard and press ` or ~ under the Esc. then type: help"mask of disapproval"4
you should only get one result. then type:
Player.addiem (code shown for mask of disapproval here) 1.
you should find it in your inventory.

INSTALATION

to install, extract files out of "Nope hood.rar" and merge the texture and meshes folder with the folders in your skyrim data. exept for the .esp file. just drop that in to skyrim data. no other folder.
author: Thesaphira2000
